title: Shell Command Contextualization

problem.en: Manually copying shell command output into prompts is tedious and error-prone.
problem.ko: 셸 명령 출력을 프롬프트에 수동으로 복사하는 것은 지루하고 오류가 발생하기 쉽습니다.

solution.en: Provide a mechanism (e.g., ! prefix) to execute shell commands and automatically inject both command and output into agent context.
solution.ko: 셸 명령을 실행하고 명령과 출력을 모두 에이전트 컨텍스트에 자동으로 주입하는 메커니즘(예: ! 접두사)을 제공합니다.

mermaid_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant Interface
    participant Shell
    participant Agent

    User->>Interface: !ls -la
    Interface->>Shell: Execute: ls -la
    Shell-->>Interface: Command output
    Interface->>Agent: Inject command + output
    Agent-->>User: Response with shell context
code_example:
# In Claude Code, typing !ls -la executes locally
# Both command and output are added to context

$ !git status
# → Executes git status
# → Adds "$ git status\n<output>" to Claude's context
# → Claude can now reason about the repo state
